doc.title: Jerusalem's Busiest Street, Showing Mt. Zion
doc.plot: An interesting scene taken in Jerusalem's busiest street. Shows the natives in picturesque costumes going in all directions, and a caravan of camels on the road to Mt. Zion in the distance. (Taken on the winter cruise of the S. S. "Auguste Victoria" of the Hamburg-American Line, leaving New York on 03 Feb 1903.)
